Issue.summary: Require PR's head to be up-to-date with master branch
Issue.description: As long as currently PRs' CI pipelines are not triggered when master is updated it is possible that one of two concurrent PRs could be merged without testing against current master. We can fix that turning onÂ *Require branches to be up to date before merging* protection for master branch for all indy core repos.
